content.html: After I was born, my mom worked as a: -temp worker/secretary/typist -direct sales associate (Mary Kay) -home childcare provider -preschool teacher -elementary school teacher So I know a whole lot about how our lack of support for mothers pushes women into low-wage, gendered work
content.value:
After I was born, my mom worked as a:
-temp worker/secretary/typist
-direct sales associate (Mary Kay)
-home childcare provider
-preschool teacher
-elementary school teacher

So I know a whole lot about how our lack of support for mothers pushes women into low-wage, gendered work
